scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npx vite" "cd backend && poetry run uvicorn src.main:app --reload --port 8000"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run preview" "cd backend && poetry run uvicorn src.main:app --port 8000"
scripts.install: cd frontend && npm install --prefer-offline --no-audit --no-fund --no-package-lock --production && npm install --prefer-offline --no-audit --no-fund --no-package-lock --only=dev && cd ../backend && poetry install
